p: Samples antioxidant activities were evaluated by DPPH test, and results were expressed as EC 50. From Figure 4, a statistical difference is seen among all months, except for November, when samples of both plants showed statistically similar EC 50. The month in which M. villosa extract showed better action against DPPH radicals is December (75.09 µg/mL) and for P. amboinicus is October (85.04 µg/mL), other results can be found in Supplementary Material.
